targets.expr:
sum( smartmon_reallocate_nand_blk_cnt_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_reallocated_sector_ct_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_reallocated_event_count_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_raw_read_error_rate_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_current_pending_sector_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_offline_uncorrectable_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_udma_crc_error_count_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_seek_error_rate_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_spin_retry_count_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_multi_zone_error_rate_raw_value )
avg(smartmon_temperature{ instance=~"$instance", disk=~"$disk" }) by (instance, disk) OR avg(smartmon_temperature_celsius_raw_value{ instance=~"$instance", disk=~"$disk" }) by (instance, disk)
smartmon_temperature{ instance=~"$instance", disk=~"$disk" } OR smartmon_temperature_celsius_raw_value{ instance=~"$instance", disk=~"$disk" }

options.content: __________ Wear and Tear __________

panels.description:
yellow after 2 years
red after 4 years

targets.expr: smartmon_power_on_hours{ disk=~"$disk", instance=~"$instance" } OR smartmon_power_on_hours_raw_value{ disk=~"$disk", instance=~"$instance" }

panels.title: Power_On_Hours

panels.description: Number of times disk was turned on

targets.expr: smartmon_power_cycles{ instance=~"$instance", disk=~"$disk"} OR smartmon_power_cycle_count_raw_value { instance=~"$instance", disk=~"$disk"}

panels.title: Power_Cycle_Count

options.content: __________ SSD Specific Values __________

panels.description:
Estimated remaining lifetime.
Based on amount of written data.
(Very vague one flash chip can be witten 10 000 times)
panels.title: Remaining_Lifetime

options.content: __________ HDD Specific Values __________

panels.description:
Average time to spin up disk. (in ms)
High values indicate problems with the motor.
panels.title: Spin_Up_Time

panels.description:
Number of unexpected power outages (no correct shutdown) 
This kind of shutdown lowers the lifetime of a disk way more than a clean shutdown
panels.title: Power_Off_Retract_Count

panels.description:
Counts start/stop events.
High values indicate high wear.
panels.title: Start_Stop_Count

panels.description:
Number times the head was placed in the parking area.
Mostly mobile disks.
300000 times is intended.
panels.title: Load_Cycle_Count

title: S.M.A.R.T disk monitoring for Prometheus Dashboard
